title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 26.6 - Sale by prescription
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 26.6 - Sale by prescription

State Regulations

Where a drug store or a licensed physician holds an AP
permit, such permit shall also include the privilege to sell alcohol to a
householder for medicinal purposes in a quantity not exceeding one pint upon a
written prescription of a regularly licensed physician; such prescription shall
state the date thereof, the name of the person for whom the same was
prescribed, and shall be preserved by the permittee and pasted in a separate
book kept for that purpose, and be but once filled. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
26.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
